control.description: Hide In Cinemas / Upcoming Movies Widget
control.label: $LOCALIZE[31077]

control.description: Hide TV Show Next Aired Widget
control.label: $LOCALIZE[31927]
$LOCALIZE[2] - [COLOR=DefaultColor2]$INFO[Skin.String(MusicCategoryIconPath)][/COLOR]
control.enable: Library.HasContent(Music) + [String.IsEmpty(Skin.String(MusicAddon1)) + String.IsEmpty(Skin.String(MusicAddon2)) + String.IsEmpty(Skin.String(MusicAddon3)) + String.IsEmpty(Skin.String(MusicAddon4)) + String.IsEmpty(Skin.String(MusicAddon5)) + String.IsEmpty(Skin.String(MusicAddon6))]

control.label: $LOCALIZE[3] - [COLOR=DefaultColor2]$INFO[Skin.String(VideosCategoryIconPath)][/COLOR]
control.enable: String.IsEmpty(Skin.String(VideoAddon1)) + String.IsEmpty(Skin.String(VideoAddon2)) + String.IsEmpty(Skin.String(VideoAddon3)) + String.IsEmpty(Skin.String(VideoAddon4)) + String.IsEmpty(Skin.String(VideoAddon5)) + String.IsEmpty(Skin.String(VideoAddon6))

control.label: $LOCALIZE[20342] - [COLOR=DefaultColor2]$INFO[Skin.String(MoviesCategoryIconPath)][/COLOR]
control.enable: Library.HasContent(Movies) + [String.IsEmpty(Skin.String(MovieAddon1)) + String.IsEmpty(Skin.String(MovieAddon2)) + String.IsEmpty(Skin.String(MovieAddon3)) + String.IsEmpty(Skin.String(MovieAddon4)) + String.IsEmpty(Skin.String(MovieAddon5)) + String.IsEmpty(Skin.String(MovieAddon6))]

control.label: $LOCALIZE[24001] - [COLOR=DefaultColor2]$INFO[Skin.String(AddonsCategoryIconPath)][/COLOR]
control.enable: String.IsEmpty(Skin.String(AddonsAddon1)) + String.IsEmpty(Skin.String(AddonsAddon2)) + String.IsEmpty(Skin.String(AddonsAddon3)) + String.IsEmpty(Skin.String(AddonsAddon4)) + String.IsEmpty(Skin.String(AddonsAddon5)) + String.IsEmpty(Skin.String(AddonsAddon6))

include.name: AddMoreCategoryBtn1PanelVisible
include.visible: [Skin.HasSetting(ExpandAddMoreCategorySettings) + [Skin.String(Custom1PanelType,4) | Skin.String(Custom1PanelType,5) | Skin.String(Custom1PanelType,9)]] | [Skin.HasSetting(ExpandAddMoreCategorySettings2) + [Skin.String(Custom5PanelType,4) | Skin.String(Custom5PanelType,5) | Skin.String(Custom5PanelType,9)]] | [Skin.HasSetting(ExpandAddMoreCategorySettings3) + [Skin.String(Custom9PanelType,4) | Skin.String(Custom9PanelType,5) | Skin.String(Custom9PanelType,9)]] | [Skin.HasSetting(ExpandAddMoreCategorySettings4) + [Skin.String(Custom13PanelType,4) | Skin.String(Custom13PanelType,5) | Skin.String(Custom13PanelType,9)]]

include.name: AddMoreCategoryBtn2PanelVisible
include.visible: [Skin.HasSetting(ExpandAddMoreCategorySettings) + [Skin.String(Custom2PanelType,4) | Skin.String(Custom2PanelType,5) | Skin.String(Custom2PanelType,9)]] | [Skin.HasSetting(ExpandAddMoreCategorySettings2) + [Skin.String(Custom6PanelType,4) | Skin.String(Custom6PanelType,5) | Skin.String(Custom6PanelType,9)]] | [Skin.HasSetting(ExpandAddMoreCategorySettings3) + [Skin.String(Custom10PanelType,4) | Skin.String(Custom10PanelType,5) | Skin.String(Custom10PanelType,9)]] | [Skin.HasSetting(ExpandAddMoreCategorySettings4) + [Skin.String(Custom14PanelType,4) | Skin.String(Custom14PanelType,5) | Skin.String(Custom14PanelType,9)]]

include.name: AddMoreCategoryBtn3PanelVisible
include.visible: [Skin.HasSetting(ExpandAddMoreCategorySettings) + [Skin.String(Custom3PanelType,4) | Skin.String(Custom3PanelType,5) | Skin.String(Custom3PanelType,9)]] | [Skin.HasSetting(ExpandAddMoreCategorySettings2) + [Skin.String(Custom7PanelType,4) | Skin.String(Custom7PanelType,5) | Skin.String(Custom7PanelType,9)]] | [Skin.HasSetting(ExpandAddMoreCategorySettings3) + [Skin.String(Custom11PanelType,4) | Skin.String(Custom11PanelType,5) | Skin.String(Custom11PanelType,9)]] | [Skin.HasSetting(ExpandAddMoreCategorySettings4) + [Skin.String(Custom15PanelType,4) | Skin.String(Custom15PanelType,5) | Skin.String(Custom15PanelType,9)]]

include.visible: [Skin.HasSetting(ExpandAddMoreCategorySettings) + [Skin.String(Custom4PanelType,4) | Skin.String(Custom4PanelType,5) | Skin.String(Custom4PanelType,9)]] | [Skin.HasSetting(ExpandAddMoreCategorySettings2) + [Skin.String(Custom8PanelType,4) | Skin.String(Custom8PanelType,5) | Skin.String(Custom8PanelType,9)]] | [Skin.HasSetting(ExpandAddMoreCategorySettings3) + [Skin.String(Custom12PanelType,4) | Skin.String(Custom12PanelType,5) | Skin.String(Custom12PanelType,9)]] | [Skin.HasSetting(ExpandAddMoreCategorySettings4) + [Skin.String(Custom16PanelType,4) | Skin.String(Custom16PanelType,5) | Skin.String(Custom16PanelType,9)]]
